translations: n.绿皮西葫芦（又名意大利青瓜）

phrs.translation: 西葫芦, 小西葫芦, 日本小黄瓜, 夏南瓜
南瓜派, 西葫芦格拉丁
小西葫芦黄花叶病毒, 花叶病毒, 矮南瓜黄化嵌纹病毒, 南瓜黄花叶病毒
西葫芦的生活, 酷瓜人生, 翠玉瓜的岁月

sentences.sentence: Aim to have some vegetables—tomatoes, carrots, zucchini, spinach and other greens, for example—with every meal.
sentences.translation: 每餐都有意识地吃些蔬菜——例如，西红柿、胡萝卜、西葫芦、菠菜和其它蔬菜。

sentences.sentence: You could make a vegetarian version with maybe some sauteed onions, peppers, mushrooms, spinach, zucchini, eggplant.
sentences.translation: 你可以用炒过的洋葱、辣椒、蘑菇、菠菜、西葫芦、茄子做一个素食版本。

sentences.sentence: If you really want to eat fruits or vegetables before runs, zucchini, tomatoes, olives, grapes, and grapefruit are all low in fiber.
sentences.translation: 如果你真的想在跑步前吃水果或蔬菜，西葫芦、西红柿、橄榄、葡萄和葡萄柚都是低纤维的。
